Ingredients.2: 0.5 cup unsweetened coconut milk beverage (such as Silk®)

Ingredients.3: 0.25 cup erythritol confectioners' sweetener (such as Swerve®)

Ingredients.4: 2 tablespoons sugar-free coconut-flavored syrup (such as Torani®)

Directions.1: Combine coconut milk, coconut milk beverage, sweetener, coconut syrup, and coconut extract in a large Mason jar with a lid. Shake to combine ingredients.
